rows.label: qst002703_msg0003
rows.name:
...Say,
would you mind listening to my story?

rows.label: qst002703_msg0005
rows.name:
After that, you see...
I failed...

rows.label: qst002703_msg0006
rows.name:
I did succeed in creating the love potion, you know?
And I even got him to drink it...

rows.label: qst002703_msg0007
rows.name:
...But you see?
The timing was terrible.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0008
rows.name:
I ran right into his girlfriend,
who had just come to meet him...

rows.label: qst002703_msg0009
rows.name:
...After drinking my love potion,
he scooped her up with incredible passion
and ran off somewhere...

rows.label: qst002703_msg0010
rows.name:
The love potion I made is extremely potent.
He'll probably never even look my way again.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0011
rows.name:
...Really, what on earth were all my years
of research for...?

rows.label: qst002703_msg0012
rows.name:
Oh, are you worried about me?
...Hehe, you're very kind.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0014
rows.name:
Back then, I only said those words
to use you...

rows.label: qst002703_msg0015
rows.name:
But maybe I'll try making a medicine
that can truly save everyone in the world.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0017
rows.name:
Thank you for listening to me.
I feel much better now, thanks to you.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0018
rows.name:
Well then, I'll go and research a medicine
that will save everyone in the truest sense.

rows.label: qst002703_msg0019
rows.name:
You too,
should be careful not to be deceived
by people like me again, alright?
